body_html:
Users should be able to write filter expressions that target users based on what experiments they have participated in and whether they are active or inactive. Here's my strawman API:

// normandy.studies is a mapping; keys are study slugs, and values are objects
normandy.studies['unique-study-name'] // Truthyness checks if the study has ever been seen by the user

// .active returns true or false depending on whether the study is active
normandy.studies['unique-study-name'].active == false

@rayborn @MattGrimes @gregglind Thoughts on the syntax above? Any other info about studies you'd like to filter by?
title: Filter by native study participation
